PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-07132022-06-20,  IRCC,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Immigration Loans Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (IMMIGRATION LOANS PROGRAM) in order to increase the total allowed advance amount from the Consolidated Revenue Fund for the Immigration Loan Program from $126.6 million to $250 million.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0149 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Immigration Loans Program)
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (IMMIGRATION LOANS PROGRAM) in order to increase the total allowed advance amount from the Consolidated Revenue Fund for the Immigration Loan Program from $126.6 million to $250 million.
